title: The Rosicrucian Mysteries
creator: Max Heindel
description: LibriVox recording of The Rosicrucian Mysteries, by Max Heindel, read by KirksVoice A primer for those interested in the basic philosophy, beliefs & secrets of the Rosicrucians. (Summary by Kirk Ziegler) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; audiobook; rosicrucian; mysteries; secrets; illumination; spiritual; light; life; darkness; consciousness; vital; subtle; earthly; sickness; health
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
